author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
AlternateStreams support relies on pinvoke to win32 apis which don't work

on non-Windows and produces errors about not loading a dll in the case of copy-item

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4542

comments.body:

Should this also be conditioned on !UNIX?

Shouldn't there be a Platform.IsSameFileSystemItem?

comments.body: @dantraMSFT I addressed your feedback.  Regarding `Platform.IsSameFileSystem` we should probably have a single API that is platform agnostic, but that's out of scope of this PR.
